title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Service User Engagement in Nursing Simulation Debriefing

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze three major issues that may arise when designing service user engagement simulation debriefings and propose solutions
Design an optimized model for the simulation-debriefing-feedback cycle using mathematical process mapping techniques
Develop a step-by-step guide for implementing service user engagement strategies through mobile-based microlearning in large-scale learner environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
